title: Houndings of Hell
description: Cage gets attacked and ends up in the hospital. While trying to explain whatâ€™s happened to him, he gets flagged for a psychiatric evaluation. Cage feels it's a ploy. Even those closest to him try to convince him to return to the hospital to have more tests done, and eventually he does return just not in the way everyone would have expected.Trigger Warning:This book contains references to religious aspects that the reader may find offensive.This book contains violence against people of all ages and genders.This book contains the ability to cause you to use profanity and/or possibly cause damage to your reading device.
